short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension to add story points to GitHub projects

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple extension adding story point capabilities to GitHub Projects! Works with issues and cards!

- For issues, either create your issue with a title starting with `[Xpt]` or simply add a label `sp: X`.
- For cards, simply add a point estimate in the body using the `[Xpt]` format.
